title: Flaw Detection on Surface-treated Steels Using Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN)
content: Boriding steels play a crucial role in improving the mechanical properties of materials, resulting in superior performance and increased durability in various industrial applications [1]. The importance of boriding steels lies in their ability to provide increased durability and efficiency in components exposed to extreme conditions, such as high load, abrasion and corrosive environments [2-4].
